item.title: Abandoned paint bucket leaking on pavement, 25th February
item.description:
This pot of paint in front of Sandringham Villa has been here for weeks and it is leaking onto the pavement and street. It was abandoned at some point and it is a health, environment and safety hazard. Could you please remove it.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Alexandra Grove, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
